p: Therefore, it can be suggested that cold pressed canola oil is comparatively better than the one extracted chemically in laboratory in terms of their nutritional ingredients. However, both are much better than commercially available canola oil brands. It is, therefore, suggested that extra virgin canola oil extracted through cold press or chemically extracted method is far better to use directly for cooking and frying purposes as it is rich with fat-soluble vitamins, essential fatty acids, beta carotene and chlorophylls.
